thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 19 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Erdogan says Syrian government to face consequences if deal with YPG reached: CNN Turk

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Erdogan says Syrian government to face consequences if deal with YPG reached: CNN Turk
text:
ANKARA (Reuters) - Syria’s government will face consequences if it reaches an agreement with the Kurdish YPG militia against Turkey’s military operation, President Tayyip Erdogan was Quote: d as telling Russian President Vladimir Putin in a phone call on Monday.
Turkish broadcaster CNN Turk said Erdogan told Putin that Turkey’s offensive, dubbed Operation Olive Branch, would continue as planned.
A source in Erdogan’s office had said the two leaders had held a phone call earlier on Monday, discussing recent developments in Syria’s Idlib and Afrin. [nA4N1N7026]
Reporting by Tuvan Gumrukcu and Ece Toksabay
